title: 372: Healing & Home
itunes:title: 372: Healing & Home
description:
Today The Broads are joined by amazing #broadsquad member, Marita White! She vulnerably shares her traumatic, shocking - then empowering and healing story. 

 

MARITA WHITE:

***Follow Marita and The Rainbow House at: https://www.instagram.com/the_rainboww_house/

***Rent The Rainbow House and Hire Marita Here: https://linktr.ee/the_rainboww_house

 

***Proceeds from ads will be donated to Marita’s nonprofit of choice - YWCA https://www.ywca.org/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***GREENCHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY130 and use code CHATTY130 to get $130 plus free shipping! 

***TALKSPACE: Sign up today at TALKSPACE.COM and get $100 off your first month with code CHATTY

***DIPSEA: Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial at DIPSEASTORIES.COM/CHATTY 

***CARE/OF: For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TAKECAREOF.COM and enter code CHATTY50

***THREDUP: Get an extra 50% off plus FREE SHIPPING on your first order just by heading to THREDUP.COM 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
